SELECT m.id, m.name, m.permission FROM support_shop.hdys_menu m LEFT JOIN support_shop.hdys_role_permission rm ON m.permission = rm.pid LEFT JOIN support_shop.hdys_permission p ON p.id = rm.pid LEFT JOIN support_shop.hdys_user_role ur ON ur.rid = rm.rid LEFT JOIN support_shop.hdys_role r ON ur.rid = r.id
WHERE ur.uid = #{userId} AND r. STATUS = '0' AND p. STATUS = '0' AND m. STATUS = '0'
ORDER BY m.sort
select r.id, r.code from support_shop.hdys_role r left join support_shop.hdys_user_role ur ON ur.rid = r.id where r.status = '0' and ur.uid = #{userId}
